Title: The Big Dream
Writer: Doriana Leondeff, Angelo Pasquini, Michele Placido
Actors: Riccardo Scamarcio, Jasmine Trinca, Luca Argentero, Massimo Popolizio
Plot: Italian Revolution, 1968. Police officer, Nicolas, wants to become an actor. He goes out in plain clothes and meets Laura who is among students against the government, Vietnam War and who seek sexual freedom. One day, his identity gets exposed and she leaves him.
